channel.title: SkaScape! Full Version ! 317!
channel.description:
[u][b]SkaScape[/b][/u]
80% - Ska 20% - Owner Hasan *Fixing Things*
[b]Features[/b] -Yanille home -Random teleportation (using the misc.random) -Random events -Basic advertiser block; only through regular chat. -Perfect muting (They cannot PM/talk/yell) -Muting players through the report abuse interface -Command class (`Rich stole my idea :p)) -Teleportation class (to save some space in your client class) -Clue scrolls (a few steps) -Following -Sound -Working prayer (NPC's hit less if you've got the correct prayer on) -Working Defence VS NPC (The higher your defence; the lower their hit) -Quite a few lists (Objects, NPC IDs, Item IDs, Co-Ordinates, etc) -Membership (using a file instead of a large boolean of Strings for the player names) -Runecrafting (right click "Teleport" on Aubury in the Varrock rune shop) -Working potions -Herb identifying -Herblore -Thieving (next to no space used, saved spaced with a pickpocketing method)
[b]Images[/b]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2196pmh.jpg[/img]
[b]Training[/b] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2s94m4g.jpg[/img]
[b]Fight demons by speaking to the Gypsy in Varrock[/b] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/34ytbb7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2d8l7c9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/rck9s0.jpg[/img]
[b]Training for Premium members[/b] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2gwdyx5.jpg[/img]
[b]Visit Shantay's pass in Al-Kharid[/b] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/nnlf1e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2vtpi4w.jpg[/img]
[b]Skillers can pickpocket in peace; no worrying about people killing your thieving NPCs[/b] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2e587b6.jpg[/img]
[b]Change your looks in the SkaScape clothing store[/b] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/34ywu1w.jpg[/img]
[b]Commands[/b] - [u]Normal[/u] [code]::loan ##### - Receive a loan for the money you input; cannot be over 500K ::repay - Repay your loan before receiving another ::players - Find out who is online ::yell "" - Send a message to every online player ::password "" - Changes the players' password to the substring[/code]
[b]Commands[/b] - [u]Moderators[/u] [code]::ipban # - Blocks the IP of the Player ID from ::players ::pban # - Permenant ban; only the Owner can revoke this ::tban # - Temporary ban ::tele ### ### - Alters the players' co-ordinates to the integers they input[/code]
[b]Commands[/b] - [u]Administrators[/u] [code]::vent "" - NPC's will speak ::itemname # - Tells you the name of the integer you input ::npcname # - Tells you the name of the NPC for the integer you input ::master - Their stats are maxed out to 99 ::refill - Fills their Special Bar up ::pickup ### # - Spawns items ::addxp # # - Gives them experience to the Skill/Amount they input[/code]
To See All Commands go to the [b]Command folder [/b]....
[b]Link Here[/b] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM[/url]
[b]Download Now![/b]
THANKS
[b]OWNER HASAN[/b]

item.title: SkaScape! Full Version ! 317!
item.dc:creator: @_Owner_Hasan - Owner Hasan -
item.description:
@_Owner_Hasan wrote:

SkaScape

80% - Ska
20% - Owner Hasan Fixing Things

Features
-Yanille home
-Random teleportation (using the misc.random)
-Random events
-Basic advertiser block; only through regular chat.
-Perfect muting (They cannot PM/talk/yell)
-Muting players through the report abuse interface
-Command class (`Rich stole my idea :p))
-Teleportation class (to save some space in your client class)
-Clue scrolls (a few steps)
-Following
-Sound
-Working prayer (NPC’s hit less if you’ve got the correct prayer on)
-Working Defence VS NPC (The higher your defence; the lower their hit)
-Quite a few lists (Objects, NPC IDs, Item IDs, Co-Ordinates, etc)
-Membership (using a file instead of a large boolean of Strings for the player names)
-Runecrafting (right click “Teleport” on Aubury in the Varrock rune shop)
-Working potions
-Herb identifying
-Herblore
-Thieving (next to no space used, saved spaced with a pickpocketing method)

Images

Training

Fight demons by speaking to the Gypsy in Varrock


Training for Premium members

Visit Shantay’s pass in Al-Kharid

Skillers can pickpocket in peace; no worrying about people killing your thieving NPCs

Change your looks in the SkaScape clothing store

Commands - Normal

::loan ##### - Receive a loan for the money you input; cannot be over 500K ::repay - Repay your loan before receiving another ::players - Find out who is online ::yell "" - Send a message to every online player ::password "" - Changes the players' password to the substring

Commands - Moderators

::ipban # - Blocks the IP of the Player ID from ::players ::pban # - Permenant ban; only the Owner can revoke this ::tban # - Temporary ban ::tele ### ### - Alters the players' co-ordinates to the integers they input

Commands - Administrators

::vent "" - NPC's will speak ::itemname # - Tells you the name of the integer you input ::npcname # - Tells you the name of the NPC for the integer you input ::master - Their stats are maxed out to 99 ::refill - Fills their Special Bar up ::pickup ### # - Spawns items ::addxp # # - Gives them experience to the Skill/Amount they input

To See All Commands go to the Command folder …

Link Here
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GADJ03EM

Download Now!

THANKS

OWNER HASAN
